name: Alfred Freddy Krupa
caption: Alfred Freddy Krupa
training: Academy of Fine Arts, University of Zagreb
awards: »Councillor Special Prize« at the 3rd International Exhibition of the Chinese Calligraphy and Ink Painting, Anshan (China), Medal Marshal Trompowsky, Matto Grosso do Sul (Brasil), Croatian Association of Artists Zagreb Annual Award for 2016 (Croatia) and many others
